sections.title: Industry Project Intern
sections.text:
MealLens Company • Windsor, ON, Canada
Sept 2022 – Aug 2024




  • Built a full-stack platform powered by SAM 2 and OpenAI CLIP to automate data processing and deliver intelligent content understanding.

  • Integrated Slack to automate notifications and streamline team workflows, improving collaboration and response time.

  • Designed and shipped responsive dashboards with interactive visualizations for real time insights, optimizing usability and performance across devices.

  • Collaborated in an Agile team, contributing to sprint planning, code reviews, and iterative feature delivery.

sections.title: Programmer Analyst
sections.text:
Cognizant Technology Solutions • Tamil Nadu, India
Sept 2022 – Aug 2024




  • Developed and maintained enterprise applications, resolving incidents and implementing feature enhancements.

  • Provided technical support, leveraging expertise in complex technologies to troubleshoot and boost solutions.

  • Collaborated with clients and senior developers in design sessions to articulate project specifications and technical requirements by communicating effectively.

  • Maintained and upgraded existing applications, ensuring seamless functionality and performance.

sections.title: Internship Trainee
sections.text:
Cognizant Technology Solutions • Tamil Nadu, India
Apr 2022 - Aug 2022




  • Completed internship training in full-stack development with exposure to front-end, back-end, and database technologies.

  • Gained hands-on experience building applications using Java Spring Boot, Node.js, and MongoDB.

  • Strengthened problem-solving and coding skills by working on practice projects and real-world development tasks.
